object.name: PollAnswer
object.description: This object represents an answer of a user in a non-anonymous poll.
object.html_description: This object represents an answer of a user in a non-anonymous poll.
object.rst_description: This object represents an answer of a user in a non-anonymous poll.

annotations.description: The user, who changed the answer to the poll
annotations.html_description: The user, who changed the answer to the poll
annotations.rst_description: The user, who changed the answer to the poll
annotations.name: user

annotations.description: 0-based identifiers of answer options, chosen by the user. May be empty if the user retracted their vote.
annotations.html_description: 0-based identifiers of answer options, chosen by the user. May be empty if the user retracted their vote.
annotations.rst_description: 0-based identifiers of answer options, chosen by the user. May be empty if the user retracted their vote.
annotations.name: option_ids
